special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The bullywug can breathe air and water

special_abilities.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
special_abilities.desc: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The bullywug has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The bullywug has advantage on Dexterity(Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet,with or without a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bullywug makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its spear.

actions.name: Pike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.desc: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The bullywug is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The bullywug has the following druid spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, poison spray, produce flame
1st level (4 slots): fog cloud, goodberry, thunderwave
2nd level (3 slots): barkskin, spike growth
3rd level (2 slots): call lightning, conjure animals (amphibians only)
